commands.name: StatusCheck
commands.title: Checks the status of Speaker module
commands.description: To work with Speaker module, Speaker module must be plugged in.

commands.name: Connect
commands.title: Connects to the Speaker module.
commands.description: Connects to the Speaker that is plugged in.

commands.name: Disconnect
commands.title: Disconnects from the Speaker module.
commands.description: Disconnects from Speaker that is plugged in.

dataVariables.name: status
dataVariables.title: Status
dataVariables.description: Gives the status of the Speaker module.
